metadata.source_integration_name: Living off the Land Attack Detection

author: Elastic
rule.description:
A supervised machine learning model (ProblemChild) or its blocklist has identified
a suspicious Windows process event to be malicious activity.
rule.name: Machine Learning Detected a Suspicious Windows Event Predicted to be Malicious Activity
rule.query:
process where
(problemchild.prediction == 1 or blocklist_label == 1) and
not process.args : (
  "*C:\\WINDOWS\\temp\\nessus_*.txt*",
  "*C:\\WINDOWS\\temp\\nessus_*.tmp*"
)
